text: @FLOTUS @WhiteHouse Tell your hubby to #BEBEST and #STOPLYING, and #STOPBEINGABULLY.  Pray for you. Would have divorced his arrogant self soon as found out he cheated with the strippers. To each their own. Happy Mother's Day. I can't be with my one and only son today thanks to CORONAVIRUS COVAID19.
